fields.name: The say command:
fields.value: There is a new command for you @Moderator : the !say command, you can now say things with this command, but you need to write it with the JSON encoding, for an example try `!say example`.

fields.name: And a Question:
fields.value:
do you want to change the prefix of the bot from ` ! ` to ` / `?
Just reply in #staff-chat
